title: Victor Lardent
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809021324/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809021324/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Victor Lardent**

Draftsman at the London Times involved in the design of [Times New Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809021324/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Times%20New%20Roman).
author: pstanley
